text: good morning welcome to cubec con this

the conformance test Suite that helps

others these are major milestones and

but I think the question on everybody's

most IND

user which pod which application can do

stability pod security policy

to do it quite
frequently thinking back to my

reconcile
this well on gke some of the things

importantly we've worked on making

source again features are important for

this
easily that's a good question um what

that may be present in your network in

uh obviously since gcp is so big on

speaking of
innovation you know one of the problems

actually contain very
well and so that's a problem for
Enterprises um today containers speak to
a kernel that is a privileged kernel and
you have many different applications
that share a kernel this leads to

but there's a large surface area of
resources that are exposed despite c
groups and name spaces and there are
frequent kernel
vulnerabilities so the chance of an

not not
negligible well there's some work going

containers is to use a hypervisor and
that has a full kernel inside the

the benefits of the low memory footprint
uh not having a full kernel in the fast

what does it do gvisor is a micr kernel
it's a very lightweight kernel and it

of what a hypervisor would do it
intercepts this calls and you know it
watches them but it doesn't have the

Prometheus for those of you who don't

examples
you can use application metrics to

you can use application and
